name: 蘇至善
objective: 本課程內容包括流體力學與熱量傳送操作及其應用。
schedule:
1.Flow Past Immersed Objects  
2.Transportation and Metering of Fluids
3.Agitation and Mixing of Fluids
4.Heat Transfer by Conduction 
5.Principles of Heat Flow in Fluids 
6.Heat Transfer to Fluids without Phase Change
scorePolicy:
期中考: 50 %
期末考: 50 %
(暫定)
materials: Textbook: McCabe,"Unit Operation of Chemical Engineering" 7th ed.
